descriptionHtml:
Hello nexus dovakins again!

My second work reveals the essence of the werewolf. What is it - a gift or punishment? Is it possible for man to control this ability? And the main question: what is better - to be born good, or to overcome your evil nature throught great effort? (Â© Paarthurnax) Perhaps, you can answer these questions yourself by watching Nordog saga. !Warning! It contains some gameplay spoilers!

Soundtrack - Moonspell, \"Wolwes from the fog\".

While this work I used the following classical console commands (tm, tfc, tcl, tgm, tc) and these useful topics: 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2018 
and 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2294

The original file has over 1 Gb size. so I had to upload a little simplified version.
So, download, unzip and do with this dark video all that you want.

You-tube video link (for lazy) : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4u8drQmLcRw
First work here ---> http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7151

Enjoy!
author: FilmCraft
